attributes.additional_details:
I think it is rude and hurtful of British people not getting what we deserve, but all others are allowed to come over here and steal our homes and benefits,
I want the goverment to stop Giving us what we deserve in our country.

Many people I know have no hope of getting a council flat, even though they were born here!
Yet there seems to be a certain number of houses set aside for foreigners.
It's time for us to take a stand for our country.
